Meeting of Society for Promotion of Relations between Austria and DPRK Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Society for Promotion of Relations between Austria and DPRK Held 
   Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Standing Committee of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK was held in Vienna on Nov. 14.
 At the meeting Adolf Pilz, chairman of the society, called for highly praising and introducing the immortal exploits performed by the three generals of Mt. Paektu in liberating Korea and building the party, army and country on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 89th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.  The meeting decided to carry in bulletins serial articles introducing the brief biography and the immortal Juche idea of President Kim Il Sung.    
 The participants expressed their determination to conduct a more vigorous solidarity movement for supporting the Korean people in their efforts to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and build a great prosperous powerful nation.

articles.title: GI's Assault Perpetrated in S. Korea
articles.content:
GIs' Assault Perpetrated in S. Korea 
   Pyongyang, November 22 (KCNA) -- Soldiers of the U.S. forces in south Korea committed an assault in Seoul on Nov. 17, according to MBC of south Korea.
 That night two GIs severely beat taxi driver surnamed Paek in Rithaewon-dong, Ryongsan District of Seoul before running away.
